Package io.goobi.viewer.api.rest.filters

package io.goobi.viewer.api.rest.filters
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.goobi.viewer.api.rest
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AccessConditionRequestFilter
    Checks requests for access conditions.
    AdminLoggedInFilter
    Only allows requests by sessisions belonging to a logged in goobi-viewer admin account.
    AuthorizationFilter
    Allows requests authorized by an authrization token.
    CORSHeaderFilter
    Adds an "Access-Control-Allow-Origin" header to a REST response with the value configured in Configuration.getCORSHeaderValue().
    CrowdsourcingCampaignFilter
    Allows access to crowdsourcing campaign resources for sessions owned by a goobi-viewer user who has access to the campaign.
    FilterTools
     
    IIIFPresentationRequestFilter
    Filter for all IIIF Presentation resources.
    IIIFPresentationResponseFilter
    Adds the @context property to all IIIF Presentation responses in the topmost json element.
    ImageApiResponseFilter
    Default implementation of ContentServerResponseFilter to apply this filter in /api/v1/ environment.
    ImageInformationFilter
    Filter for IIIF Image info.json requests.
    ImageInformationRequestFilter
    Forwards requests to IIIF image resources referencing a image number (Solr-field "ORDER") to a requests with the appropriate filename.
    ImageParameterFilter
    Adds additional parameters to iiif contentServer requests as requestContext properties.
    ImageRequestFilter
    Request filter for image requests.
    PdfInformationFilter
    Response filter for PDF info requests.
    PdfRequestFilter
    Request filter for PDF download requests.
    RecordFileDownloadFilter
     
    UserLoggedInFilter
    Only allow requests from a session with a logged in Goobi viewer user.
